meanings.definition: The amount that a dropper can hold.
meanings.sent1: Mom measured the medicine with a droppersful for the baby.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two droppersful of vanilla extract.
meanings.sent3: The scientist accidentally spilled a droppersful of liquid on the lab table.
meanings.sent4: The droppersful of rain fell gently on the thirsty plants.
meanings.sent5: The potion required a precise droppersful to work effectively.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist counted out several droppersful of the medication.
meanings.sent2: She needed to buy more droppersful for her science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The students each held a droppersful in their hands during the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent4: The droppersful of dye created a beautiful pattern in the water.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully mixed different droppersful of paint to achieve the perfect shade.
